definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: The margin of error was plus or minus 3 percentage points.
sentences.chinese: 誤差區間爲正負3個百分點。

sentences.english: But in the United States, auto sales fell 34 percent last month.
sentences.chinese: 然而在美國本土，上月汽車銷量下降了34個百分點。
準確率提高了約20個百分點。

sentences.english: In a 10-year period, the number of students earning an education degree declined 5 percent.
sentences.chinese: 10年間，教育學位的學生人數下降了5個百分點。

sentences.english: In Asia - Tokyo's Nikkei was up nearly 3 percent.
sentences.chinese: 在亞洲，東京日經指數上漲了近3個百分點。

sentences.english: Howitzer and Rocket Accuracy has been slightly decreased by 5 points.
sentences.chinese: 榴彈炮和火箭精度已略有下降5個百分點。

sentences.english: During that time, U. S. unemployment has jumped a full percentage point.
sentences.chinese: 在此期間，美國失業率跳升了一個百分點。

sentences.english: For eery 5-unit increase in body mass, the odds of risk-adjusted mortality fell 10 percent.
sentences.chinese: 體重每增加5個單位，調整死亡率下降10個百分點。

sentences.english: The headlined unemployment rate is just over 10 percent.
sentences.chinese: 報章頭條的失業率已高過10個百分點。

sentences.english: With each assignment missed, you will lose a percentage point.
sentences.chinese: 缺一份作業，扣掉一個百分點。

sentences.english: Its cargo load factor was 68%, down by 7 ppt YoY.
sentences.chinese: 貨郵運載率爲68%，同比下跌7個百分點。

sentences.english: The price of vegetables alone was up 62 percent.
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜價格一項就上升了62個百分點。

sentences.english: That's barely half a percentage point above long-term inflation forecasts.
sentences.chinese: 這比長期通貨膨脹預期僅高出半個百分點。

sentences.english: Another two countries come within 2 percentage points of the target prevalence of stunting.
sentences.chinese: 另有兩個國家離目標發育不良患病率仍差2個百分點。

sentences.english: Cholesterol levels for vegetarians are 14 percent lower than meat eaters.
sentences.chinese: 素食者的膽固醇水平低於肉食者14百分點。

definition: to slow/to slow down (the pace of)
to adjust downwards/to lower (prices, wages etc)
to demote/to pass down to a lower unit
